sub_title: Communication Student at HAN International School of Business | Looking for an internship in the Event industry and Communication in the Netherlands or France | Available from January 2022
summary:
A motivated and hard-working international Communication student, who has a fierce desire to improve and develop myself professionally, I am eager to obtain more knowledge and new skills in professional way day by day.

Accomplishment, Perfection, Certainty are my three principal values. In multi-cultural context, I have obtained experience and expertise in practical client's projects related to customer journey, branding, marketing, and  research. 

With great interests in dealing with people and knowledge in communication, I wish to work in an environment that is different everyday regarding customer service and event industry. 

"Don't wait for the perfect moment, take a moment, and make it perfect" is my motto and inspiration in my life.

treasury_media.title: Step Úp Digital Magazine
treasury_media.description: This is a digital magazine that me and my colleague designed on a project for the Recruitment department of HAN International Business School (HAN ISB) to promote the university with its agents abroad. The mission here is to raise brand awareness as well as attract more international students for HAN ISB.

treasury_media.title: Heineken Infographic - Research project
treasury_media.description: This is an infographic that I designed to visualize the result of a quantitative research. The objective of the research is for figuring out the difference in terms of brand awareness and brand image toward Heineken between 18-25-year-old Vietnamese drinkers and young Dutch beer consumers.

treasury_media.title: Newsletter - Step Úp Magazine
treasury_media.description: This is a newsletter that I designed for the Step Úp Magazine for readers to scan the code to go through that magazine. Its aim is to attract more and more international students to my university - HAN International School of Business.

treasury_media.title: Poster for Feedo Needo Foodbank
treasury_media.description: After doing research about Feedo Needo Foodbank and its target group as a brand, we worked together  to increase the brand awareness and brand engagement of Feedo Needo via social media. We re-created a new landing page for the foodbank, designed how a better post on its social channels look like, and created an attracting poster for an event of them. All of these creative products must fit with Feedo Needo's brand identity as well as be consistent and appealing.

treasury_media.title: IKEA Customer Journey Project
treasury_media.description: After carrying out both desk and field research about IKEA's customer journey, we have come up with several "A+ concepts" to improve the shopping experience of IKEA's clients.

projects.title: Uniqlo - Strategic Marketing Project
projects.description:
With this project, Uniqlo was chosen to carry out a strategic analysis, diagnosis, and recommendations for the company. 

In order to practice strategic marketing situations to make relevant decisions, managerial tools, as well as theoretical fundamentals, were explored and employed. In fact, Strategic Diagnosis (via PESTEL, PORTER forces, SWOT tools); STP approach on the market; brand identity and brand image; corporate strategies related to the 4 Ps are utilized in this case. 

Thanks to this project, I have improved: 
-	Sharpening critical thinking related to concrete situations
-	Defining consistent and creative marketing strategies

contributors.headline: Communication Student at HAN International School of Business | Looking for an internship in the Event industry and Communication in the Netherlands or France | Available from January 2022

projects.title: Tesla - Strategic Management Project
projects.description:
In this project, I and my colleagues took Tesla brand as an example to analyze the business strategy by examining the internal and external environment of the company. Therefore, relevant strategic diagnosis of the company’s resources and skills, direct and indirect competitors, the attractiveness of the business segment, legal and environment constraints, etc are used to analyze in this case. 

Note: there are three business units that are chosen and the “Electric Vehicle Production” unit was analyzed by me

contributors.headline: Communication Student at HAN International School of Business | Looking for an internship in the Event industry and Communication in the Netherlands or France | Available from January 2022

projects.title: Trendwatching project
projects.description:
This portfolio is about my trend research: what goes on in the world outside. How did I look at them and research them; and how will they affect our businesses, profession, and personal lives. 

With this project, I can:
- Independently detect trends in global affairs related to business issues
- Create my own individual opinion on this issue and relate that to my personal ambitions as a future professional and individual growth based on multiple sources and research
- Research and reflect on these trends by describing, analyzing, and reporting on the topics chosen and relate them to a professional context using scenario planning as a discipline
- Reflect on other trend perspectives

contributors.headline: Communication Student at HAN International School of Business | Looking for an internship in the Event industry and Communication in the Netherlands or France | Available from January 2022

projects.title: Campaign for Feedo Needo Foobank (United Kingdom)
projects.description:
Project duration: 3 days

With this project, I and three other international teammates had chance to utilize effective social media marketing to improve Feedo Needo's website (landing page) and its future campaigns/ posts. 

In this case, the objective is to increase brand awareness and brand engagement of the food bank via social media through an appealing post and poster. A thorough research about the brand market, target group, and competitors has been conducted. The ultimate products and ideas were pitched to the client at the end of the project.

contributors.headline: Communication Student at HAN International School of Business | Looking for an internship in the Event industry and Communication in the Netherlands or France | Available from January 2022

projects.title: Digital Magazine - Step Úp Magazine
projects.description:
In this project, I and my group created a digital magazine including the promotion of the actual magazine online. Step Úp magazine was created to improve the brand awareness and engagement of HAN University with international students all over the world. The design of the magazine must ensure that the target group is invited to read the magazine. 

With this project, I have: 
- Translated a creative concept into a visual concept by applying Design Thinking. 
- Applied InDesign, typography, color, layout, and images.
- Used branding knowledge to set up a promotion plan for the magazine, by a (social) media plan using the principles of accountability in budget/ planning/ resources

projects.title: BVLGARI Perfume in Dutch Market Research
projects.description:
The objective of this research was to create and improve the brand engagement of BVLGARI Perfume and generation Z in the Netherlands through effective social media marketing. Numerous solutions had been carried out to assist BVLGARI Perfume to achieve this goal in its next campaigns/ projects. 

Note: This project was provided by HAN International School of Business.

projects.title: Content Marketing - Creating Content for online communication
projects.description:
In this project, I worked on creating content for an international case study in an intercultural context. In this case, it is about my school - HAN International School of Business (ISB).
I have:
- Learned to create content for organizations to stand out and reach the target audiences 
- Learned to influence consumer behavior and attitude through effective content 
- Created relevant content in a structured way to communicate with target audiences at the right moment, through appropriate channels, with appropriate messages, by appealing text and design/ image

projects.title: Qualitative Research - Flipsen Healthcare
projects.description:
A fundamental qualitative research about the brand problem, target group, and competitors had been carried out in this project. 

The objective of the research is for figuring out the brand  engagement toward Flippen Healthcare of
young adults from 18 to 24 years old in the United States through enhancing their external communication by their social media.
